name: Hydrodicic Garden
description:
Water your garden, but unfortunately the mysterious shopkeepers only let dice decide your flowers' fate.

Made for Nordic Game Jam 2022!

How To Play:
Mouse Only!
Roll the dice by pressing the roll-button
Click to lock any dice with a number you like
After you're happy with the numbers or run out of re-rolls, drag them to the icons on the right to invest that value in that water-type
In your garden view,  click on one of the six flowers to water them, this will decrease the corresponding water-type's reserve
After all dice are rolled and all water-reserves are used up, click the "Go to sleep"-button to rest for the day
The next day, the flowers will look either healthy, dry or overwatered
Rinse and repeat!

Press "Escape" to quit the game, and note that progress DOES NOT save

Notes!
The video is a concept trailer of the game if it was extended and not actually relfecting the true gameplay as it stands

If all plants of the same type die and you invest dice in that water-type, then you will get softlocked and not be able to continue with the game, if this happens, the only way to fix it is to press escape to exit the game and restart
